full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR GYI MJUG TU SBYAR CHOG PA'I ZAB LAM PHYAG RGYA CHEN PO GSUNG MGUR BZHUGS SO, ,` YID BZHIN NOR BU ZHES BYA BA'I GSOL 'DEBS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES AE WAm ZA 'JUG PHYAG RGYA CHEN PO LA GSOL 'DEBS YID BZHIN NOR BU ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, ,RDO RJE RGYAL SRAS THON TSE RING RDO RJES BSKUL MA MDZAD LTAR, BZHAD RDOR MTSAN 'CHANG BA ME SBRUL DGUN ZLA 'BRING PO'I TSES GCIG LA SBYAR BA'I YIG BSKRUN BLO TSE MING CAN GYIS BGYIS SO, ,)
dates_of_the_author_(зохиогдсон_өдөр): ME SBRUL DGUN ZLA 'BRING PO'I TSES GCIG
